experience.title: Senior Manager
experience.description: Responsible for the support and execution of Structural & Civil designs for Utility scale solar PV and solar hybrid (Solar+ Storage) systems across USA.‚Ä¢	Review and analyze topographic surveys, hydrology, environmental (CIA), and geotechnical reports to ensure adherence to internal, local, state, and federal engineering standards, identifying any issues impacting the proposed design.‚Ä¢	Responsible for project design reviews at key milestones throughout the final design process, coordinating with internal reviews and approvals from key stakeholders as necessary.‚Ä¢	Contribute to the development of Civil and Structural Engineering design standards, setting requirements for quality, presentation, and cost-effectiveness.‚Ä¢	Review Structural and Civil plans, specifications, and calculations.‚Ä¢	Prepare technical specifications and review vendor drawings for Structural and Civil system requirements of large solar PV power plants.‚Ä¢	Collaborate with Technical Consultants to define objectives and conduct detailed studies as needed.‚Ä¢	Facilitate cross-functional coordination for design updates, field suggestions, and specifications related to service or construction items.‚Ä¢	Offer technical solutions to general challenges encountered during construction period.‚Ä¢	Attending discussions with Client/Client‚Äôs consultant/independent engineers for optimizing theproject cost.
experience.description_html: Responsible for the support and execution of Structural & Civil designs for Utility scale solar PV and solar hybrid (Solar+ Storage) systems across USA.‚Ä¢ Review and analyze topographic surveys, hydrology, environmental (CIA), and geotechnical reports to ensure adherence to internal, local, state, and federal engineering standards, identifying any issues impacting the proposed design.‚Ä¢ Responsible for project design reviews at key milestones throughout the final design process, coordinating with internal reviews and approvals from key stakeholders as necessary.‚Ä¢ Contribute to the development of Civil and Structural Engineering design standards, setting requirements for quality, presentation, and cost-effectiveness.‚Ä¢ Review Structural and Civil plans, specifications, and calculations.‚Ä¢ Prepare technical specifications and review vendor drawings for Structural and Civil system requirements of large solar PV power plants.‚Ä¢ Collaborate with Technical Consultants to define objectives and conduct detailed studies as needed.‚Ä¢ Facilitate cross-functional coordination for design updates, field suggestions, and specifications related to service or construction items.‚Ä¢ Offer technical solutions to general challenges encountered during construction period.‚Ä¢ Attending discussions with Client/Client‚Äôs consultant/independent engineers for optimizing theproject cost.

experience.title: Manager I AMPYR Tech
experience.description: Technical Due diligence/Feasibility study/Lenders technical Advisory for Solar and Wind projects across Europe (UK (170MW+), Germany (250MW+), Netherlands (150MW+)) and USA (Florida) approx. 600MW+ (Early Development to RTB stage, Merger & Acquisition projects) and work very closely with different stakeholders for the project deliverables. Worked with EPC companies, vendors, company‚Äôs engineers and program managers to ensure organizations needs are met. Involved in preparation of Scope Of Work for Solar/Battery projects for owners engineering job, Quality control documents, Request For Proposal preparation of civil works for EPC negotiation.Lead early-stage pipeline development, e.g. projects and assist in the identification of new development prospects by utilizing internal development tools and resources for layout preparation, Evaluation of Energy Yield assessment report, different optimizations techniques for site specific value enhancement to improve financial aspects , experienced in negotiation techno commercial roles. Prepared technical documents for bidding proposal and also worked very diligently with EPC, Vendors to work on best commercial quotes. Helping development of inhouse Solar asset monitoring system team.

positions.title: Manager, Hydropower & Infrastructure
positions.description_html:
Hydropower Project :
‚Ä¢ Part of development of Feasibility study for Hydropower Potential in whole Manipur Basin ‚Äì carrying out all necessary surveys, studies, site investigation and watershed delineation process required for preparation of basic design and feasibility report.
‚Ä¢ To carry out Technical Due-Diligence of the thirteen operational small Hydro Power Projects in Karnataka ‚Äì Verification of Energy Yield for all 14 projects. This is to verify the Generation Estimate for 90% and 50% dependable year which is also the estimate for design & secondary energy along with P75 estimate.
Smart City Project :
‚Ä¢ Responsible for preparation of drawings, BoQ of different parks (ex- Heritage Park), river front development, Lake Beautification, Important buildings and construction methodology for Belagavi SCP.
‚Ä¢ Storm water drainage plan and design for different area based Development (ABD) areas.
‚Ä¢ Part of GIS group to prepare GIS based map as per requirement.
‚Ä¢ selection of sub contractor and finalization of sub contracts, preparation of project report and estimation, bill of quantities, resident engineer on behalf of consultant,

positions.subtitle: Tractebel Engineering (ENGIE) S.A.
positions.description: * Perform probabilistic Safety Assessment (Fire & Flooding PSA) for Belgian Nuclear Power Plant* Updation of existing models for all Belgian Nuclear Units (using the Risk Spectrum software). * Support to the Operator in the use of these models for various applications (assessment of plant    modification, decision-making process, optimizing the training of operators, etc.).* Presentation and justification of performed studies to the Safety Authorities (Belgian Nuclear       Authorirties).* Inquiring and critical mind, dynamic, rigorous and pragmatic.
positions.title: PSA Engineer - Nuclear Power
positions.description_html:
* Perform probabilistic Safety Assessment (Fire & Flooding PSA) for Belgian Nuclear Power Plant
* Updation of existing models for all Belgian Nuclear Units (using the Risk Spectrum software).
* Support to the Operator in the use of these models for various applications (assessment of plant
modification, decision-making process, optimizing the training of operators, etc.).
* Presentation and justification of performed studies to the Safety Authorities (Belgian Nuclear
Authorirties).
* Inquiring and critical mind, dynamic, rigorous and pragmatic.

positions.subtitle: Tractebel Engineering ( ENGIE) Pvt. Ltd.
positions.description: Responsible for Optimisation studies of hydro power projects and also includes  Hydraulics design of hydropower components viz. intake, flushing tunnels, desilting chamber, headrace tunnel, penstock/pressure shaft, surge shaft, Head losses calculations in Water conductor system, etc. as well as Structural analysis and design using Staad pro.Worked on preparation of Bill of Quantities and Project Cost Estimates. And is a key member in documentation and preparation of Bankable Detailed Project Reports and technical bid proposals. 	Experience in Optimization of Installed Capacity and various hydro power components. 	Experience in Hydraulics design of hydropower components viz. intake, flushing tunnels, desilting chamber, headrace tunnel, penstock/pressure shaft, surge shaft, Head losses calculations in Water conductor system, etc. 	Experience in Transient studies and analysis. 	Experience in preparation of Bill of Quantities and Project Cost Estimates. 	Experience in documentation and preparation of Bankable Detailed Project Reports. 	Experience in preparation of Technical Bid Proposals.
positions.title: Engineer Design - Hydropower
positions.description_html:
Responsible for Optimisation studies of hydro power projects and also includes Hydraulics design of hydropower components viz. intake, flushing tunnels, desilting chamber, headrace tunnel, penstock/pressure shaft, surge shaft, Head losses calculations in Water conductor system, etc. as well as Structural analysis and design using Staad pro.
Worked on preparation of Bill of Quantities and Project Cost Estimates. And is a key member in documentation and preparation of Bankable Detailed Project Reports and technical bid proposals.

Experience in Optimization of Installed Capacity and various hydro power components.
Experience in Hydraulics design of hydropower components viz. intake, flushing tunnels, desilting chamber, headrace tunnel, penstock/pressure shaft, surge shaft, Head losses calculations in Water conductor system, etc.
Experience in Transient studies and analysis.
Experience in preparation of Bill of Quantities and Project Cost Estimates.
Experience in documentation and preparation of Bankable Detailed Project Reports.
Experience in preparation of Technical Bid Proposals.
